member.name: T:CodeForDotNet.Windows.Native.ClipboardHelper

member.summary: Retrieves a .NET from the clipboard correctly.
member.returns: .NET or null when no EMF is on the clipboard.

member.summary: Places a .NET onto the clipboard correctly, otherwise it is not visible by other applications due to the new format used in .NET.
member.param: Form.Handle used as owner of Clipboard data.
.NET to copy to clipboard.

member.summary: Gets the path to the .Net Framework.

member.summary: Installs the specified assembly into the native image cache, including all dependencies.
member.param: Fully qualified local file system path to the target assembly.
Any console output. Use to obtain error text.

member.summary: Removes an assembly from the cache.
member.param: Assembly name, partial or fully qualified.
Console output (if any) during execution.

member.name: M:CodeForDotNet.Windows.Native.NativeCodeGenerator.ExecuteProgram(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String@)
member.summary: Executes a program with the specified parameters and working directory, waits for exit and
member.param: Path of the program to execute.
Parameters to pass to the program.
Working directory in which to execute.
Maximum time to allow the program to execute, before terminating with -1 return code.
Console output (if any) during execution.
member.returns: Return code, 0 = success, -1 = timeout or other error, other values are program specific.
